law.catch_line: Provisions of referendum to be fixed by Commissioner.
law.text: With respect to any referendum conducted under the provisions of KRS 247.4451 to 247.4483, the Commissioner of Agriculture shall, before calling and announcing the referendum, fix, determine, and publicly announce at least thirty (30) days before the date determined for the referendum, the date, hours, and polling places for voting in the referendum, the effective date of the assessment, if adopted, the amount and basis of the assessment proposed to be collected, the means by which the assessment shall be collected if authorized by the producers, and the general purposes to which the amount collected shall be applied. No annual assessment levied under the provisions of KRS 247.4451 to 247.4483 shall exceed fifteen hundredths of one percent (0.15%) of the value of the year's production of the agricultural commodity produced by any producer included in the group to which the referendum is submitted.
law.history: Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1990.
